version_description: This new upgrade includes BOC debit card services, local banks funds transfer for Australia and login via SMS OTP (One Time Password) for Singapore.
This new upgrade includes BOC debit card services, local banks funds transfer for Australia and login via SMS OTP (One Time Password) for Singapore.

1. BOC Mobile Banking is now available to our customers in Vietnam and Philippines.
2. Enhancements to debit card and RMB Pre-Settlement services.
3. Support JomPay funds transfer in Malaysia.

This new upgrade will introduce new features and incorporates general enhancements to optimise performance and user experience.

3.New for BOC Europe customers: General enhancements for SEPA funds transfer
